action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Johnson with amendments. With written report No. 116-46.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 111.

vote.text: Passed Senate with amendments by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.
